content: Help me understand karma yoga from the Bhagavad Gita. I want to learn how to apply it in modern life.
Please always cite specific chapter and verse numbers when explaining concepts.

Turns 1-75 (74 events). Participants: assistant, user. Event mix: casual×42, clarification×32. User focus: Can you explain the difference between karma yoga and other yogas?; Can you explain how Krishna explains detachment from results?.
